dict.acceptation: 令人感兴趣的，有趣的；引起兴趣的；有趣的；令人关注的；

sent.orig: These are not just complex decisions; these are interesting ones. Interesting decisions make for interesting games.
sent.trans: 这些不光复杂，而且好玩。好玩的抉择构成好玩的游戏。

sent.orig: You can see interesting places and interesting people by travelling.
sent.trans: 通过旅游你能看到有趣的地方、有趣的人。

sent.orig: Such an attitude "makes me interesting for figure skating and makes him interesting for skiing. "
sent.trans: （正是这样的态度）使我成了花样滑冰界的有趣现象，也使他成了滑雪界的有趣现象。

sent.orig: Interesting decisions make for interesting games.
sent.trans: 好玩的抉择构成好玩的游戏。

sent.orig: Jim is a rather interesting fellow (rather an interesting fellow).
sent.trans: 吉姆是一个颇为有趣的人。
